text: Sure. Okay. Can you tell me now? Well, this one is in the cookie jar and this is, she tried to climb the, oh no, no this boy, I think this is the same one, huh? What's going on? The stool, she was climbing and the stool tipped over. Okay. How about over here? Is there something else going on over here? She was doing the dishes, I think. She spilled something. Okay, that's fine.
